Total Cost of Revenue: direct costs of leased and rented property or equipment

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss available to common stockholders basic

Interest Income: interest and dividend income securities trading or measured at fair value
interest and fee income loans and leases held for sale
interest and fee income loans and leases held in portfolio
interest and fee income loans held for sale mortgages
Other Income (Expense): debt and equity securities realized gain loss
fees and commissions mortgage banking and servicing
fees and commissions on deposit accounts and lending activities
gain loss on sale of debt investments
interest income expense after provision for loan loss
net gains losses from equity investments

General and Administrative: information technology communications and equipment expense
Other Operating Expenses: federal deposit insurance corporation premium expense
provision for loan lease and other losses

Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax
total credit and debit card fees

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
preferred stock dividend accretion and other
preferred stock dividends and other adjustments
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
